name: Catch Cock Run
description:
You will forget the meaning of the word boredom thanks to this exciting and challenging puzzle game.

These tiny exotic chickens are a bunch of tireless revelers, which made chaos and dancing to their life philosophy. The problem of these mad chickens is that they do not care if somebody gets angry or slightly upset with their noisy activities. On the contrary they are now trying to invade and infect with their lifestyle every quite place on earth.

Defend the country side and all the small villages from the dancing chickens’ rebellion.
Stop them from crossing the bottom borders before the time runs out, in order to prevent them from doing a big mess.

Spend a great time with these amazing party chickens.
